body: @mrtatham @jappleseed big dawgs gotta cool off for a couple day $AAPL might hit $170 then bounce we’ll see tho depends what Powell says🤞🏻

Really excited for today team... barely slept last night. Today will be one of the biggest days of the year in my opinion that can dictate where the markets are headed the next 18-24 months. FED meeting later this am after 2 days of Central Bank discussing economy. In my opinion, we could finally see a "slow down" on this ultra Bull Run that no one has seen in decades if rates timelines are shortened and tappering is 2x. I will be on my toes waiting to see what happens today and J Pow. Hopefully everyone plays safe. For me, this meeting will dictate how I play all of 2022, LONG or SHORT, Large Caps, small caps, Indexes etc. Have a great volatile trading day. $SPY $QQQ $AAPL $ADBE $SPXS

$AAPL 

Since the worst than expected retail has been released today and the Congress has passed to raise the debt ceiling which will be heading to easy Biden signature, it gave us the hint that Jerome will take dovish approach to keep economy safe and sound.

That means Fed will have more money to combat worst Covid in the century as Congress has raised the debt limit to help America back to its footing.

$AAPL FOMC press conference at 2 pm today, make sure to prioritize profits over greed.
